body: [Andoryu] Mama was Hit on at the Beach

@ScrubKingOfficalBitchBoSlayer LMAO bro calm the fuck down. I fucking love Akire's works. I've probably been reading it way before than you did. And of course I know that this story is generic dogshit. I was just pointing out the irony of the release order because this doujin is almost like an exact replica of Andoryu's- or call it an interpretation or a rendition if you prefer that (whatever makes you happy). Stop malding over comments on a fucking hentai site, old man.
Shade and decensored some and this one would've been good
